remarks:
The Null Set Axiom of ZF set theory: the empty set exists.  Corollary 5.16 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20.  For the unabbreviated version, see ~ ax-nul .  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 9-Jul-2011.)
